tokenSwap.title: Build a Token Swap on Solana
tokenSwap.description: Create a decentralized token swap application using the Jupiter aggregator on Solana. The application should allow users to swap between different SPL tokens with the best available rates.
requirements: Integrate Jupiter aggregator for token swaps
Support swapping between any SPL tokens
Include unit tests for core functionality

nftMarketplace.title: NFT Marketplace MVP
nftMarketplace.description: Build a basic NFT marketplace where users can list, buy, and sell NFTs. Focus on core functionality rather than advanced features.
requirements: List NFTs for sale with custom pricing

daoVoting.title: DAO Voting System
daoVoting.description: Implement a simple DAO voting mechanism where token holders can create and vote on proposals.
